# This file is autogenerated
title: removeEmail
description: Overview of the removeEmail method
slug: wallets/reference/account-kit/signer/classes/BaseSignerClient/removeEmail
---

Removes the email for the authenticated user, disallowing them from login with that email.

## Import

```ts
import { BaseSignerClient } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Returns

`Promise<void>`
A promise that resolves when the email is removed
